website_summaries.verdict: A release aid that doesn't put pressure on your wrist and encourages proper archery form.
pros: Trigger is pulled straight away from the target, allowing your front hand to follow through the target and your trigger finger to pull away for better form
Very comfortable, as it has 2.5 times more padding than others
cons: This release can put some extra wear on your D-loop

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality control!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this release! But the attention that they put into detail is pathetic. The hook portion that holds the d loop was jagged and sharp and within three days cut through a brand new d loop. Very unhappy with the quality control process. The buckle is very comfortable and the release is smooth
customer_reviews.author: Hunter Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Must Have
customer_reviews.text: This release immensely improved my accuracy. Other releases would place pressure on my wrist but the wide strap distributes the pressure evenly. The adjustable release poundage, 20 degree head pivot (to reduce string torque), and the hook design all work flawlessly together. Well worth the money. I like the buckle so I can maintain consistency when wearing. Other releases with buckles usually "wear out" the hole in short order but not this one. I have over 5,000 shots with this release and is still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: RLS

customer_reviews.title: Hopefully just a defective release...
customer_reviews.text: I have had this release pre-fire during draw twice within the first 100 shots, down 2 arrows and a bow inspection fee for a “light dry fire” which cause my cable mount to shift into contact with my vanes. Luckily that was all that happened, worried that I had bent my cams. I have also felt the hook slip just by playing with it with my hand. The strap itself is comfortable but is quite bulky and takes a while to break-in to settle into a consistent anchor position because there is so much padding. I have lost all confidence in this release...
customer_reviews.author: Harrisd503

customer_reviews.title: Swivel not 100% and large strap loops
customer_reviews.text: Nice release, but the head does not swivel as freely as advertised. Most often I have to push the trigger back down after the draw to get it flat/not sticking up. Also, I’m rather average in size and don’t like that the strap does not fit in the retainer. The leather strap is too thick, so only the elastic fits under the clip... leaving a large loop sticking off the back.
customer_reviews.author: J. T. Texas

customer_reviews.title: Best yet
customer_reviews.text: I've tried another wrist release with caliper style and a hand held thumb release with caliper style. I shoot more consistently and comfortably with this. I have an easier time repeatingly rest it in the same spot on my cheek near my ear to improve my accuracy. Only complaint is sometimes the trigger doesn't reset the hook and I need to check it and do it manually witch makes a clicking sound that a animal may hear.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Very nice release.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great release. I love being able to just hook it on the string loop instead of opening jaws and then closing them on it. It is also very comfortable, and the strap's buckle is quiet and consistent. I like how it flips back out of the way when needed as well. It frees up your hand and doesn't flip forward on it's on. I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: WRC

customer_reviews.title: Great, affordable wrist trigger release
customer_reviews.text: One of the best wrist trigger release there is in the market. Well built to last you a long time. Trigger can be adjusted to your liking. Crisp and short is how I have it set the trigger. Like how it can be folded back against your wrist is won’t be in the way if your working with your hands a bit. Plus is affordable. You get great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: EDDIE G.

customer_reviews.title: Fast D-loop engagement
customer_reviews.text: This is the easiest and fastest trigger release I have found for the money. After trying a number of other releases, including the Scott Little Goose single caliper and the Tru-Fire Edge double caliper, (both good releases by the way) I decided to try the Tru-Fire Hardcore hook release. For me, it is the fastest and easiest to engage the d-loop when under a pressure situation. Time will tell how it holds up, but so far I'm impressed with the quality and design.
customer_reviews.author: J. P. Bontrager

customer_reviews.title: I think both are equally perfect but personal preference is what made me decide on ...
customer_reviews.text: I did extensive research on this release compared to the Scott Rhino XT. I think both are equally perfect but personal preference is what made me decide on this. I prefer the angle of the trigger and the foldback option that the Rhino does not offer. Plus NO ONE on the market has as soft, comfortable, and quiet of a buck as this one has. Easy to adjust length, trigger sensitivity, and torque swivel. Best release on the market hands down.
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: Takes some getting use to
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars only because I found adjustments were a little hard to make.... be careful ... trigger is touchy, accidentally hit a few times or hook slipped off d-loop. Thankfully no one got hurt. Solid design. 1st time using "open" hook type....
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Sanders

customer_reviews.title: I had been shooting in the range of a 12" ...
customer_reviews.text: I had been shooting in the range of a 12" -14" circle at 60 yards. The first set of 10 arrows I shot with this release were within a 7" circle! Hard to believe that a release would have that much impact on my accuracy. I have just used it a few times so far, so I can't give it a fair review yet; but I will not be using any other release in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this release. I made some slight modifications to it and now it shoots amazingly. Has a lot of adjustments, and wrist strap it comfortable. Its also a quite release, so its great for hunting.
customer_reviews.author: Mater

customer_reviews.title: Nice release
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and the trigger was set perfect for me from the factory.
customer_reviews.author: Lance M. Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Stiff / Quality release.
customer_reviews.text: i noticed the release is a bit on the stiff side.. maybe because its brand new.. but over all its a solid release.
customer_reviews.author: A26

customer_reviews.title: Loved everything about this release but had same issue as ...
customer_reviews.text: Loved everything about this release but had same issue as other review, the hook would not open far enough so it would pluck my d loop like a guitar sending arrows to the left, and busted my first D loop on my new Halon after 50 shots frayed my second one, my cheap $20 jaw release fixed that, unfortunately not sure if it's a defect or what but think I'll buy the same one in the caliper jaw style instead of hook to be safe
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: It is the Hardcore Max model.
customer_reviews.text: Love the release. Well built and to description; however the label for the item is off this is the TruFire Hardcore Max model. Comfortable on the wrist and easily adjustable. Only gripe is sometimes the trigger release doesn’t fully lock after release so because when re drawing and always make sure it’s tightly locked. Other than that no complaints otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: MasPierre

customer_reviews.title: Nice release
customer_reviews.text: Fits well, easy to use, kind to the bow string. Very touchy though. Be prepared to release when you touch the trigger.
customer_reviews.author: Soldier

customer_reviews.title: Got what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t find the black leather version in my local store anymore. This is exactly what I wanted. The package was brand new and undamaged.
customer_reviews.author: SSTARON67

customer_reviews.title: Awesome release. I bought this one to replace a ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome release. I bought this one to replace a tru fire caliper release. I was a little hesitant on the hook release - but have to say this is super smooth and has a lot of swiveling points to make tourque a non-issue. Very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter 63069

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this release. I had a close jaw one before this and I’ll never go back. This one is also super comfortable and fits way better. I wish I would have upgrade much sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick Baker

customer_reviews.title: Nice Release
customer_reviews.text: This has become my favorite release. Good design, sturdy, well made. Adjustments solid. Releases smoothly and precisely.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great release! Improved my shots!
customer_reviews.text: A great release for the deal I bought it at ($65). It has greatly improved my shots over the last release I had (jaw style Tru ball). The only reason I didn't give it a 5 star is because I have been noticing increase wear on d loop from where it must be catching during the shot. I haven't had any of my d loops break, but it is something to consider and keep an eye on.
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: Best release for anyone
customer_reviews.text: Not inexpensive, just the best product of it's type on the market. Excellent materials and workmanship, simple adjustments to make it fit your hand and your draw length, easy trigger setting to control let-off. This is the release for beginners and up to masters of archery.
customer_reviews.author: J. S. Anders

customer_reviews.title: Nice release
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my son. He was very happy with it and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great and has improved my grouping because of all the ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great and has improved my grouping because of all the adjustable parts on it. It is nice and comfortable on the wrist.
customer_reviews.author: Nomad Hunting

customer_reviews.title: Tremendous
customer_reviews.text: Like it compared to my truglo release that has boa system.
customer_reviews.author: HASR

customer_reviews.title: Over 31” draw length=bad fit
customer_reviews.text: If you are an over 30” draw length, do not buy this release. It is extremely uncomfortable and difficult to find your anchor point.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Ewen

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: The Hardcore Max is extremely comfortable and adjustable...worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Cramer

customer_reviews.title: Best hook release that I've found
customer_reviews.text: Great release. Buckle fits my wrist great comfortable and consistent. The release is very smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Coachjoe

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent build quality, and the adjustability allows you to dial it right in to your liking. The wrist strap is the most comfortable I have ever had.
customer_reviews.author: David Breed

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat it.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Works great, love the adjustability and flexibility. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: James Walker

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: I was considering buying ones about half the price of this but decided to splurge on myself a little. I don't regret it one bit. My wrists aren't that big so after buckling the straps, the clip only goes so far and the excess slack is a bit loose.
customer_reviews.author: Super Ertoy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I have found the adjustments easy to make but most importantly, this release is comfortable, crisp, and dependable. It releases smoothly and quietly. It folds back securely and snaps back out easily and quietly.
customer_reviews.author: L. Merritt

customer_reviews.title: Well built but different.
customer_reviews.text: Still getting used to it. Well built but takes some adjustment.
customer_reviews.author: staush

customer_reviews.title: Great Product! Trigger is very sensitive right out of ...
customer_reviews.text: Great Product! Trigger is very sensitive right out of the package. Easy to adjust to your liking. Very comfortable to shoot. Awesome release!
customer_reviews.author: D. Jones

customer_reviews.title: best release very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have shot roughly 1000 arrows with this release and I absolutely love it. The adjustability is great and is by far the most comfortable release I have ever used
customer_reviews.author: zach n

customer_reviews.title: Love this and it's the real deal!
customer_reviews.text: I called Tru Fire to ensure I was getting the real deal, because the packaging looked different from what I'd seen and he ensured me this was legitimate. It was a gift and he absolutely loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Brandie Gibbs

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: This little jewel is the best release I have ever used. A buddy had bought one, I tried it out an fell in love. I will newe go back to a closed jaw release again. Aggressive hook design an heavy duty wrist strap. This thing will not disappoint
customer_reviews.author: Jmounce89

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: he loves this tru fire buckle for his bow-loves bow hunting
customer_reviews.author: Deb Helmerson

customer_reviews.title: Has many adjustments could fit any one
customer_reviews.text: Amazing highly recommend very highly quality and comfortable I’ve been able to adjust the way I can shoot all day long without feeling any burn or redness around my hand
customer_reviews.author: Ali alaasemi

customer_reviews.title: Game changer
customer_reviews.text: Just get it! Shoot my hoyt defiant matched with bloodline arrows and my montec broadhead.
customer_reviews.author: DRBB

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Better than I expected. If you have big hands it may feel a little short but it will work once you draw back
customer_reviews.author: hoosier

customer_reviews.title: Loving the hook style.
customer_reviews.text: Hook style releases make it easy to latch the D-loop without needing to take your eyes oft your target.
customer_reviews.author: JlS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, feel like velvet. My friends were very jelly
customer_reviews.author: Hazmus

customer_reviews.title: sweet shooter!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome release!! Helped to eliminate my left/right issues at 40-50-60 yards, highly reccomend this release!!
customer_reviews.author: Jefro H.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality. The fold back feature is handy when in the field or just pulling arrows out of the target.
customer_reviews.author: John Smith

customer_reviews.title: You will not be disappointed. Way comfortable and having your draw in center ...
customer_reviews.text: Yes! You will not be disappointed. Way comfortable and having your draw in center line without torque is a no brainer. Adjustable as well... can't miss.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: The best release on the market
customer_reviews.text: I have to tell you this release has change everything for me accuracy it's through the roof and build quality is second to none if you're on the fence about this product do yourself a favor and just buy it you won't regret it
customer_reviews.author: stephen gail

customer_reviews.title: For a man
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife who is brand new to archery. She hated it because it is way too big and bulky for a woman. So I let her used my Scott Sabertooth and she loved it. So I needed a new release and started shooting this one. The micro adjustments are incredible. You can finesse this thing so it becomes part of your body. The trigger can be adjusted to a hair or a log. My buddy has a the wiseguy by spot hogg and he likes mine better.
customer_reviews.author: Doug A. Brubaker

customer_reviews.title: Best Release I've Shot
customer_reviews.text: This is a great release. Both my wife and I shoot it. You can adjust trigger travel and weight to suit your preference. The trigger gets super light which is what I want in a release. It has an anti-torque pivoting head which helps minimize torquing though it isn't as torque free as a strap connector. The fold-back feature is awesome because it allows you to get it out of your way for pulling arrows or adjusting your bow.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Best release on the market
customer_reviews.text: I owned a Truefire Hardcore before but lost it on a hunt. I love this release, wouldn't buy anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Long

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Release
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many releases before, but this one is my favorite. It is very adjustable for length and trigger sensitivity, and is very smooth. The wrist padding makes it very comfortable and easy to pull on even heavy draw weight bows. I was very used to the type of release with a claw type head on it that would pinch from both sides. But I soon got used to using the hook on the release to grab the strip loop and it is great. Definitely buy one.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Christiansen

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and Accurate
customer_reviews.text: The title says it all, this release is comfortable, quiet because of the buckle, and accurate! I also liked the hook because it is easy to attach to your loop.
customer_reviews.author: B477

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it !! Looked at several models before deciding on this one and I’m couldn’t be happier with my choice!! The padded strap is excellent!!
customer_reviews.author: Monte Blaha

customer_reviews.title: Best buy I've made the year!
customer_reviews.text: I always used scott releases before which are also good but this was a whole new level of comfort and adjustability!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lonestar1

customer_reviews.title: Best trigger at an affordable price
customer_reviews.text: Best trigger I have used by far. Extra cushion on the strap for added comfort. Super smooth when firing. Best trigger at an affordable price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best trigger I have ever used. Worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Kevin K.

customer_reviews.title: wrist release
customer_reviews.text: The most accurate release I've ever used and I've used a lot to find the release that works the best
customer_reviews.author: matthew j.

customer_reviews.title: i love this release
customer_reviews.text: i love this release. it tightened up my groups considerably and wont torque the string. ill never use a claw release ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Greek

customer_reviews.title: I love everything about this release from the ability to swing ...
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this release from the ability to swing the release out of the way to the hook that I can put on loop without looking. Just by feel.
customer_reviews.author: D Burtch

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable. I thought I might have a problem with just a hook for a release, but soon got used to it. Did it make me hold my bow any more steady?.....errr no.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Beach

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic release. Costs more than most, but well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: TNboy

customer_reviews.title: This is the best release that I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: This is the best release that I have ever used. Don't even think about it just buy it. You will buy it if not now after you use the cheaper unreliable ones out ther.
customer_reviews.author: richard griffith

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable wrist strap, returned it!
customer_reviews.text: I found the wrist strap to be very uncomfortable, which was surprising. There is plenty of padding on it but it really dug into my wrist to the point where it was painful. Ended up sending this back and getting a Tru-Ball Fang which despite having less padding, is way more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: HuskyKMA

customer_reviews.title: Awesome release
customer_reviews.text: This release has improved my accuracy and confidence. I can tell a big difference between the single hook over the cam jaws. Highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: chase stewart

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very comfortable strap. when new the fold back is really stiff but loosens up with use
customer_reviews.author: arice

customer_reviews.title: Very good release that I ever buy it.
customer_reviews.text: I used it in the minute I got it from the mial box. And it was very smooth on the triger and the pull back the bow. Thanks Tru-fire.
customer_reviews.author: Song S Voung

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comforter and adjustable to your desired length and trigger sensitivity
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome release
customer_reviews.text: One of the best triggers I've ever used and I could not believe the increase in my accuracy. What an awesome release!
customer_reviews.author: Jamescurt

customer_reviews.title: Great release
customer_reviews.text: Mint release, comfortable, smooth, and don't let the open hook rattle you, stays on the string just fine. Great product, arrived on time as well.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Hardcore
customer_reviews.text: My first release by Trufire, the quality on this release is great. I love the fold back option which makes it comfortable when I put my hands in my hand warmer while in the treestand.
customer_reviews.author: aaron

customer_reviews.title: Almost but not for me
customer_reviews.text: I didn't care for this release. It was very bulky at the strap and gritty at the trigger. It seems quality built but i wanted something sleek and smooth. I liked the Scott release Better.
customer_reviews.author: AFC man

customer_reviews.title: TruFire knocked this one out of the park.
customer_reviews.text: Great release. Trigger is super adjustable, wrist strap is possibly the best I've ever had on any release, very comfortable and the offset him design lets me get into my anchor easily even with my short ATA bow (Hoyt Carbon Spyder 30). The swiveling and rocking head is a great addition. If the durability matches the quality of design and craftsmanship, it'll serve me well.
customer_reviews.author: Eric John Scivicque jr

customer_reviews.title: tru fire hardcore
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable and love the pivoting head. Keeps your you consistent on every shot.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Limubrg

customer_reviews.title: great release
customer_reviews.text: Great release, very comfortable and has a solid feel to it. Fast shipping also!
customer_reviews.author: Todd Allen Lundy

customer_reviews.title: Good for men NOT women!
customer_reviews.text: This is super comfy but HUGE! it definately isn't for a lady, I bought this because of the fold back and that it stated it was cushiony but when I received it....it was sooo big on me AND I DO NOT have small hands and wrists! I actually have big hands and wrists for a girl! Sending back to exchange for the trufire edge....a friend has one and I tried it on and it fits great! And still has the fold back mechanism I am looking for! Giving it 3 stars because it actually is a great buy for a guy just NOT a lady!
customer_reviews.author: Love Amzn

customer_reviews.title: lots of good options!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this release for quite awhile now and it works great! I'm a better shot with it! it has a bunch of adjustments for trigger pull and length of travel which is cool. it also has a reset hook which broke a couple months ago. I just wish my fingers could reach the trigger better so I could squeeze the trigger, so I might try out the Spot Hogg Wise guy release I heard it was good.
customer_reviews.author: jeremiah valpatic

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Much faster to hook up on the string loop,very smooth trigger!
customer_reviews.author: bigskytrader

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Hook didn't open far enough causing the bow string to snag on release making the bow shoot left.
customer_reviews.author: theresa demers

product_meta.title: Tru-Fire TRUFIRE Hardcore Buckle Foldback MAX
product_meta.description:
The Tru-Fire Hardcore Buckle Foldback MAX provides archers with complete customization being able to adjust trigger tension from 3 oz all the way to 16 oz depending on your liking. The upgrades do not end there on this release, for comfort, there is now a an adjustable strap the is not only wider, but much thicker than before. The pivoting head of the Tru-Fire Hardcore Buckle Foldback MAX features 20 degrees of motion from side to side to release torque and help shooters become even more consistent. With a single, deep, jaw, the Tru-Fire Hardcore Buckle Foldback MAX is easy to use and allows archer's to quickly hook d-loops in pressured situations. 

 * Leather buckle foldback strap
 * Over 5/8" length adjustment
 * Fully adjustable trigger travel
 * Swept back trigger
 * Guaranteed not to slip off loops
 *
feature_bullets: Plush black evolution II buckle has 2.5x more padding and is slightly wider with rolled edges creating the most comfortable strap on the market
Adjust trigger pressure (separate from trigger travel) from 3 ounces to well over 16 ounces by just a couple turns of the screw
Over 5/8 inch length adjustment, swept back trigger
Hook design with Tru center technology 20 degree head pivot, guaranteed not to slip off loops
Quick and easy trigger travel adjustment. Fits both left and right hands. 100% made in the USA
Trigger pressure adjustable from 3 to over 16 ounces
